text: Prospect is a monthly British general-interest magazine, specializing in politics, economics, culture, arts, and current affairs. The magazine was launched in October 1995 by David Goodhart. Some of the world's leading intellectuals have featured in Prospect in the last few years. Prospect received worldwide attention in October 2005 when it published its list of the world's top 100 public intellectuals, which included Noam Chomsky, Umberto Eco, Richard Dawkins, Steven Pinker and Christopher Hitchens. ==References== Category:1995 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Magazines of the United Kingdom
title: Prospect (magazine)
